tiles.name: old_delhi_red_fort_district
tiles.description: Home to the iconic Red Fort, a symbol of Mughal power, now a bustling tourist destination intertwined with local life.

tiles.name: chandni_chowk_marketplace
tiles.description: The heart of Old Delhi, a chaotic and vibrant marketplace filled with spices, street food, and hidden alleys, Shreyansh's home.

tiles.name: jama_masjid_vicinity
tiles.description: Surrounding the grand Jama Masjid mosque, a center of Islamic culture and a labyrinth of traditional crafts and food stalls.

tiles.name: daryaganj_book_market
tiles.description: A sprawling second-hand book market, a treasure trove of forgotten knowledge and literary gems, buzzing with students and scholars.

tiles.name: kashmere_gate_isbt_area
tiles.description: A major transportation hub, the Inter-State Bus Terminal connects Delhi to surrounding regions, a melting pot of travelers and commerce.

tiles.name: civil_lines_residential_zone
tiles.description: A quieter, more spacious residential area with colonial-era bungalows and tree-lined streets, a stark contrast to the Old Delhi chaos.

tiles.name: new_delhi_railway_station
tiles.description: One of India's busiest railway stations, a gateway to the city, filled with the energy and diversity of the nation.

tiles.name: raj_ghat_memorial_park
tiles.description: A solemn memorial dedicated to Mahatma Gandhi, a peaceful green space offering respite from the urban bustle.

tiles.name: lodi_garden_historic_site
tiles.description: A historical garden complex with tombs and monuments from the Lodi dynasty, a serene escape with ancient secrets.

tiles.name: connaught_place_commercial_hub
tiles.description: A circular commercial district, the heart of New Delhi, with shops, restaurants, and colonial architecture, a modern center of activity.

tiles.name: paharganj_backpacker_district
tiles.description: A budget-friendly district known for its hostels, cheap eats, and a vibrant mix of international travelers and local culture.

tiles.name: karol_bagh_shopping_area
tiles.description: A bustling shopping district known for its affordable clothing, electronics, and a wide array of local businesses.

tiles.name: delhi_university_north_campus
tiles.description: A sprawling university campus, a center of learning and youthful energy, with historic buildings and vibrant student life.

tiles.name: yamuna_river_floodplains
tiles.description: The fertile plains along the Yamuna River, used for agriculture and recreation, a lifeline for the city.

tiles.name: north_delhi_industrial_area
tiles.description: An industrial zone with factories and warehouses, contributing to the city's economy and creating a gritty landscape.

tiles.name: gt_karnal_road_corridor
tiles.description: A major highway connecting Delhi to northern regions, a vital transportation artery for goods and people.

tiles.name: rohini_residential_sector
tiles.description: A planned residential area with apartment complexes and parks, offering a more structured urban environment.

tiles.name: pitampura_commercial_complex
tiles.description: A modern commercial complex with shopping malls, office buildings, and entertainment venues, a symbol of Delhi's growth.

tiles.name: mangolpuri_resettlement_colony
tiles.description: A densely populated resettlement colony, reflecting the challenges of urban migration and the city's growing population.

tiles.name: bawana_industrial_area
tiles.description: A large industrial area on the outskirts of Delhi, housing factories and manufacturing units of various scales.

tiles.name: old_delhi_walled_city_core
tiles.description: The densely populated core of Old Delhi, with narrow alleys, crumbling havelis, and a rich tapestry of history and tradition.

tiles.name: khari_baoli_spice_market
tiles.description: Asia's largest spice market, a sensory overload of aromas and colors, a testament to Delhi's trading heritage.

tiles.name: sanjay_lake_recreational_area
tiles.description: A man-made lake and park offering recreational activities, a green lung for the city's eastern part.

tiles.name: ip_estate_power_hub
tiles.description: A major power generation and distribution hub, essential for Delhi's energy needs.

tiles.name: rajiv_chowk_metro_station
tiles.description: One of the busiest metro stations in the world, a crucial interchange connecting different parts of Delhi.
